Package index

Inspect table (schema-only) -> data.frame schema

Privacy & Bundles

Create a fake-data bundle for LLM workflows

Bundle from DB schema only (no row reads)

Create a copy-paste prompt for LLMs

Zip a set of files for easy sharing
